requirement: This code is intended to implement a file writing operation that writes a specified number of bytes from a buffer to a file, with error handling and status signaling.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK WriteFile
VAR_INPUT
	bExec	:	BOOL;//功能块触发变量
	writeBuffer	:	ARRAY[0..255] OF BYTE;//写数缓冲区
	writeNum	:	UDINT;//写入数据的字节数
	fileName	:	STRING;//文件的路径
END_VAR
